ai-patthana15.68:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.68:0.3_0: doing what is skillful and pleasant,
ai-patthana15.68:1.1_0: creating a wholesome quality, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.68:1.1_1: Not doing a dealing with skillful qualities arise, they don’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.68:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.68:2.1_0: for the sake of depending on thought, not skilled in terms of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.68:2.1_1: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.68:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
